flavor: "Hitting them when they are weakest sometimes means acting before you want to." -Alice Merchant
printed_text: Make a run. If you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip, each installed icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the run.
stripped_printed_text: Make a run. If you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip, each installed icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the run.

printed_text: +2[mu] The first time each turn you access a card not in Archives and do not steal or trash it, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +2 mu The first time each turn you access a card not in Archives and do not steal or trash it, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: The Archivist tracks all the clans and their members, and official dealings clans have with the various corps. Half law clerk and half historian, he wields a tremendous amount of power doing a job no one else wants, but none can do without.
printed_text: +1[link] Whenever the Corp scores an initiative or security agenda, force the Corp to "Trace 1 if unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity."
stripped_printed_text: +1 link Whenever the Corp scores an initiative or security agenda, force the Corp to "Trace 1 if unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity."

flavor:
1) Find the weakness.
2) Exploit the weakness.
3) Repeat.
printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Derez up to 3 pieces of ice.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Derez up to 3 pieces of ice.

flavor: "So, yeah, I just reverse engineered a tracer, and then built it back up with some new lines of code. Pretty stellar." -Los
printed_text: Expose 1 non-ice card, then make a run.
stripped_printed_text: Expose 1 non-ice card, then make a run.

flavor: "You created a distributed AI replica of yourself and projected it into the network to run for you!?"
printed_text: [trash]: Prevent all but 1 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Prevent all but 1 net damage.

flavor: "To beat cautious sysops, you've got to get creative. Commandeering Network systems is like using their own strengths against them." -Kabonesa Wu
printed_text: The install cost of each piece of ice that is not installed in the innermost position is increased by 1.
stripped_printed_text: The install cost of each piece of ice that is not installed in the innermost position is increased by 1.

printed_text: Make a run. When this run ends, add Mad Dash to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point if you stole at least 1 agenda during the run; otherwise, suffer 1 meat damage.
stripped_printed_text: Make a run. When this run ends, add Mad Dash to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point if you stole at least 1 agenda during the run; otherwise, suffer 1 meat damage.

flavor: "The newest electronic-warfare rollout from NEXT Design has us sysops drooling." -Mason Bellamy
printed_text: If there is a rezzed piece of NEXT ice when you score NEXT Wave 2, you may do 1 brain damage.
stripped_printed_text: If there is a rezzed piece of NEXT ice when you score NEXT Wave 2, you may do 1 brain damage.

flavor: "Dismantle. Dissect. Is there really a difference?"
printed_text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost a [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 2 brain damage.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. Subroutine Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. Subroutine If the Runner has lost a click to break a subroutine during this run, do 2 brain damage.

printed_text:
Defense Construct can be advanced.
[trash]: Add 1 facedown card from Archives to HQ for each advancement token on Defense Construct. Use this ability only during a run on Archives.
stripped_printed_text: Defense Construct can be advanced. trash: Add 1 facedown card from Archives to HQ for each advancement token on Defense Construct. Use this ability only during a run on Archives.

printed_text: The first time a subroutine on a piece of AP ice is broken each turn, do 1 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: The first time a subroutine on a piece of AP ice is broken each turn, do 1 net damage.

flavor: "The ultimate aim of martial arts is not having to use them." - Miyamoto Musashi
printed_text:
When the Runner passes Kakugo, do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner passes Kakugo, do 1 net damage. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text: Whenever the Runner avoids or removes 1 or more tags, you may draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner avoids or removes 1 or more tags, you may draw 1 card.

flavor: "'What does BRE stand for?' Have you seen its Net presence?" -Bernice Mai
printed_text:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, whenever the Runner breaches a server for the remainder of this run, they access 1 fewer card.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace[4]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. Subroutine Trace[2]. If successful, whenever the Runner breaches a server for the remainder of this run, they access 1 fewer card.

printed_text: Whenever you forfeit an agenda, place 1 advancement token on a card and 1 additional token for each agenda point the agenda was worth.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you forfeit an agenda, place 1 advancement token on a card and 1 additional token for each agenda point the agenda was worth.

printed_text: Forfeit an agenda: Rez up to 3 pieces of ice, lowering the cost of each by 2[credit] for each printed agenda point on the forfeited agenda.
stripped_printed_text: Forfeit an agenda: Rez up to 3 pieces of ice, lowering the cost of each by 2 credits for each printed agenda point on the forfeited agenda.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to rez this upgrade, forfeit 1 agenda.
The first time each turn you advance a card in the root of or protecting this server, place 1 more advancement counter on that card.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to rez this upgrade, forfeit 1 agenda. The first time each turn you advance a card in the root of or protecting this server, place 1 more advancement counter on that card.

flavor: Senate staffers and clerks of the MCA can be seen thronging Khondi Plaza during break times.
printed_text:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez ice protecting this server. X is the number of remote servers.
stripped_printed_text: X recurring credits Use these credits to rez ice protecting this server. X is the number of remote servers.

printed_text: [trash]: Cards cannot be installed until the end of the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Cards cannot be installed until the end of the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
